pageHeader: [Test case generation] Generate API test cases from headers & parameters

prompt.expectations: AI should write basic tests for the POST method to be used by Postman
prompt.sideEffectsOrComments: AI did well, all tests turned out to be working

assessment.comments: Another test case generation example, but this one is focusing on API testing.

3.changeLog: Started using GPT-4 in the prompt + genralising it to work with any API client (not just Postman).

4.revisedPrompt: Write API test cases for a {{REQUEST_TYPE}} request with body: {{REQUEST_BODY}}
4.changeLog: Converted the prompt to a template prompt.

5.revisedPrompt: Act as a senior software development engineer in test. Write API test cases for a {{REQUEST_TYPE}} request with body: {{REQUEST_BODY}}

6.revisedPrompt: Act as a Senior Software Development Engineer in Test. Write API test cases for a {{REQUEST_TYPE}} request with parameters: {{REQUEST_PARAMETERS}} and headers: {{REQUEST_HEADERS}}
